DataElement.preferredName: Secondary Malignant Neoplasm Within Radiation Field Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator response regarding whether a patient developed a secondary malignant neoplasm within the radiation field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Secondary Malignant Neoplasm Within Radiation Field Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A term that is used to describe either a new primary cancer or cancer that has spread from the place in which it started to other parts of the body._On the inside; contained in._The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A term that is used to describe either a new primary cancer or cancer that has spread from the place in which it started to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: A malignant neoplasm that arises from a pre-existing lower grade lesion, or as a result of a primary lesion that has spread to secondary sites, or due to a complication of a cancer treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The area of the body exposed to radiation during radiation therapy.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: DCI CRF:  Duke Cancer Institute Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
